pages.text: There are three qualities of gems that can show up as a result of your injection and incubation efforts. Perfect, also known as prime gems, standard gems; and off-color, also known as defective gems.

Perfect gems emerge with greater stats and more ability slots, they are more powerful and are the most desired version of a gem. In the inventory, a perfect gemstone will have an animated sparkle.$(br2)They have a higher chance of emerging when there are plentiful amounts of cruxes around your injection site, or when they're added to your Incubator.
Standard gems are just your everyday average gems, with their usual abilities and stats. Self-explanatory down to the letter.

Off-color gems emerge with lesser stats and fewer ability slots, they are considered to be garbage or undesirable. The model of an off-color gem will be skewed and misshapen.$(br2)Off-color gems have a higher chance of emerging when there aren't enough cruxes around your injection site or added to your Incubator.
